snippet: A Kremlin-linked Web site released a clip of an angry Vladimir V. Putin, fueling talk that he may replace his prime minister and cabinet.
abstract: Kremlin-linked Web site leaks video clip of angry Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin threatening to dismiss top officials, fueling speculation that Prime Min Dmitri A Medvedev and members of his cabinet are in danger of being fired.
lead_paragraph: A Kremlin-linked Web site released a clip of an angry Vladimir V. Putin, fueling talk that he may replace his prime minister and cabinet.

headline.seo: Video Shows Putin Threatening to Dismiss Officials
headline.main: Video Shows an Angry Putin Threatening to Dismiss Officials
headline.print_headline: A Video Shows an Angry Putin Threatening to Dismiss Officials
